title: I can't believe riot just left us in the dark
body: Riot, because of your "bug" you made half your community lose their games but there wasn't even a single form of compensation or loss prevented and then you answer other peoples posts but not the ones asking for loss prevention? Why??

replies.body: I haven't seen any official Riot communication on any threads here or on NA? Usually in cases like this once a bandaid fix is slapped on the teams involve buckle down to work on a fix, which often means we don't hear anything for a while, so I'm a bit confused as to what answers you are talking about.
